titleStmt.title: A prognostication concerning the frost: by Monsieur Cassini, the French king's astrologer. ; Translated from the French copy.
titleStmt.author: Cassini, Giovanni Domenico, 1625-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by E. Whitlock near Stationers-Hall,
